alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Harris; Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 9:27PM CDT until April 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Chambers County in southeastern Texas... Southern Liberty County in southeastern Texas... Northeastern Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dayton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 9:15pm, quarter sized hail was reported near Dayton. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Liberty, Dayton, Kingwood, Old River-Winfree, Ames, Kenefick, Devers, Lake Houston, northeastern Atascocita and Wallisville. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in League City.
